atk-s0511a6:1_0: Evaṁ ekappahāreneva dasasahassilokadhātuṁ ekandhakāraṁ katvā tasmiṁ bhagavati parinibbute tassa aparabhāge
atk-s0511a6:1_1: navutivassasahassāyukesu manussesu anukkamena parihāyitvā dasavassesu jātesu puna vaḍḍhitvā anukkamena
atk-s0511a6:1_2: asaṅkhyeyyāyukā hutvā puna parihāyitvā navutivassasahassāyukesu jātesu sumano nāma bodhisatto pāramiyo
atk-s0511a6:1_3: pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā mekhalanagare sudattassa nāma rañño kule sirimāya nāma deviyā
atk-s0511a6:2_0: So anukkamena vuddhippatto sirivaḍḍhanasomavaḍḍhanaiddhivaḍḍhananāmadheyyesu tīsu pāsādesu tesaṭṭhiyā
atk-s0511a6:2_1: nāṭakitthisatasahassehi paricāriyamāno surayuvatīhi paricāriyamāno devakumāro viya navavassasahassāni
atk-s0511a6:2_2: dibbasukhasadisaṁ visayasukhamanubhavamāno vaṭaṁsikāya nāma deviyā anupamaṁ nāma nirupamaṁ puttaṁ janetvā
atk-s0511a6:2_3: cattāri nimittāni disvā hatthiyānena nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a6:3_0: So tehi parivuto dasamāse padhānacariyaṁ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya anomanigame anomaseṭṭhino dhītāya anupamāya
atk-s0511a6:3_1: nāma dinnaṁ pakkhittadibbojaṁ pāyāsaṁ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṁ vītināmetvā anupamājīvakena
atk-s0511a6:3_2: dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā nāgabodhiṁ upagantvā taṁ padakkhiṇaṁ katvā aṭṭhahi tiṇamuṭṭhīhi tiṁsahatthavitthataṁ
atk-s0511a6:3_3: tiṇasantharaṁ katvā tattha pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0511a6:7_0: Tattha maṅgalassa aparenāti maṅgalassa bhagavato aparabhāge.
atk-s0511a6:7_1: Sabbadhammehi asamoti sabbehipi sīlasamādhipaññādhammehi asamo asadiso.
atk-s0511a6:8_0: Sumano kira bhagavā bodhisamīpeyeva sattasattāhāni vītināmetvā dhammadesanatthaṁ brahmāyācanaṁ sampaṭicchitvā –
atk-s0511a6:8_1: “kassa nu kho ahaṁ paṭhamaṁ dhammaṁ deseyya”nti upadhārento attanā saha pabbajitānaṁ tiṁsakoṭiyo ca attano
atk-s0511a6:8_2: kaniṭṭhabhātikaṁ vemātikaṁ saraṇakumārañca purohitaputtaṁ bhāvitattamāṇavakañca upanissayasampanne disvā –
atk-s0511a6:8_3: “etesaṁ paṭhamaṁ dhammaṁ deseyya”nti cintetvā haṁsarājā viya gaganapathena mekhaluyyāne otaritvā uyyānapālaṁ
atk-s0511a6:8_4: pesetvā attano kaniṭṭhabhātikaṁ saraṇakumārañca purohitaputtaṁ bhāvitattakumārañca pakkosāpetvā tesaṁ
atk-s0511a6:8_5: parivārabhūtā sattatiṁsakoṭiyo attanā saha pabbajitā tiṁsakoṭiyo ca aññe ca bahū devamanussakoṭiyo cāti
atk-s0511a6:12_3: Sāyaṁ amatabherī nāma amatapariyosānaṁ navaṅgaṁ buddhavacanaṁ.
atk-s0511a6:13_0: Sumano pana lokanāyako abhisambodhiṁ pāpuṇitvā paṭiññānurūpaṁ paṭipadaṁ paṭipajjamāno mahājanassa bhavabandhanamokkhatthāya
atk-s0511a6:13_1: kusalaratanassa kilesacorehi viluppamānassa parittānatthaṁ sīlavipulapākāraṁ samādhiparikhāparivāritaṁ
atk-s0511a6:17_8: Saddhammapuravaruttamanti saddhammasaṅkhātaṁ puravaresu uttamaṁ seṭṭhaṁ padhānabhūtaṁ.
atk-s0511a6:17_9: Atha vā saddhammamayesu puresu pavaresu uttamaṁ saddhammapuravaruttamaṁ.
atk-s0511a6:17_11: Paṭividdhadhammasabhāvānaṁ sekkhāsekkhānaṁ ariyapuggalānaṁ patiṭṭhānaṁ gocaranivāsaṭṭhena nibbānaṁ “nagara”nti vuccati.
atk-s0511a6:17_12: Tasmiṁ pana saddhammavaranagare so satthā avicchinnaṁ akuṭilaṁ ujuṁ puthulañca vitthatañca satipaṭṭhānamayaṁ mahāvīthiṁ māpesi.
atk-s0511a6:21_4: Vipulavitthatanti āyāmato ca vitthārato ca puthulavitthataṁ,
atk-s0511a6:21_7: Satipaṭṭhānavaruttamanti satipaṭṭhānañca taṁ varesu uttamañcāti satipaṭṭhānavaruttamaṁ.
atk-s0511a6:21_8: Atha vā varaṁ satipaṭṭhānamayaṁ uttamavīthinti attho.
atk-s0511a6:22_0: Idāni tassa nibbānamahānagarassa tassaṁ satipaṭṭhānavīthiyaṁ cattāri sāmaññaphalāni catasso paṭisambhidā
atk-s0511a6:22_1: cha abhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyoti imāni mahaggharatanāni ubhosu passesu dhammāpaṇe pasāresi.
atk-s0511a6:26_0: Idāni bhagavā imāni ratanabhaṇḍāni ye pana appamattā satimanto paṇḍitā hiriottappavīriyādīhi samannāgatā,
atk-s0511a6:26_1: te ādīyantīti tesaṁ ratanānaṁ haraṇūpāyaṁ dassento –
atk-s0511a6:29_0: Te te ime guṇavare, ādiyanti yathāsukha”nti. – āha;
atk-s0511a6:30_1: Appamattāti pamādassa paṭipakkhabhūtena satiyā avippavāsalakkhaṇena appamādena samannāgatā.
atk-s0511a6:30_9: Puna teti vuttappakāre guṇaratanavisese te kulaputtā ādiyanti paṭilabhanti adhigacchantīti attho.
atk-s0511a6:30_10: Sabbaṁ pana sumano bhagavā kataviditamano dhammabheriṁ āhanitvā dhammanagaraṁ māpetvā iminā nayena paṭhamameva satasahassakoṭiyo bodhesi.
atk-s0511a6:35_0: Yadā pana sumano lokanāyako sunandavatīnagare ambarukkhamūle titthiyamadamānamaddanaṁ yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ
atk-s0511a6:40_0: Yadā pana dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu devatā imasmiṁ cakkavāḷe sannipatitvā manussā ca nirodhakathaṁ samuṭṭhāpesuṁ –
atk-s0511a6:40_4: Evaṁ samāpajjanaadhiṭṭhānavuṭṭhānādīsu vinicchayaṁ kātuṁ asakkontā saha manussehi chasu kāmāvacaradevalokesu
atk-s0511a6:40_5: devā ca navasu brahmalokesu brahmāno ca dveḷhakajātā dvidhā ahesuṁ.
atk-s0511a6:40_6: Tato narasundarena arindamena nāma raññā saddhiṁ sāyanhasamaye sumanadasabalaṁ sabbalokanāthaṁ upasaṅkamiṁsu;
atk-s0511a6:40_7: upasaṅkamitvā arindamo rājā bhagavantaṁ nirodhapañhaṁ pucchi.
atk-s0511a6:40_8: Tato bhagavatā nirodhapañhe vissajjite navutipāṇakoṭisahassānaṁ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a6:47_0: Tassa pana sumanassa bhagavato tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṁ.
atk-s0511a6:47_1: Tattha paṭhamasannipāte mekhalanagaraṁ upanissāya vassaṁ vasitvā paṭhamapavāraṇāya arahantānaṁ koṭisahassena
atk-s0511a6:47_4: Athāparena samayena saṅkassanagarassāvidūre arindamarājakusalabalanibbatte yojanappamāṇe kanakapabbate
atk-s0511a6:47_5: nisinno saradasamayarucirakaranikaro divasakaro viya yugandharapabbate munivaradivasakaro arindamarājānaṁ
atk-s0511a6:47_6: parivāretvā āgatānaṁ purisānaṁ navutikoṭisahassāni dametvā sabbe ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā tasmiṁyeva
atk-s0511a6:47_7: divase arahattaṁ pattehi bhikkhūhi parivuto caturaṅgasamannāgate sannipāte pātimokkhaṁ uddisi.
atk-s0511a6:47_9: Yadā pana sakko devarājā sugatadassanatthāya upasaṅkami,
atk-s0511a6:47_10: tadā sumano bhagavā asītiyā arahantakoṭisahassehi parivuto pātimokkhaṁ uddisi,
atk-s0511a6:60_5: Tadā kira amhākaṁ bodhisatto atulo nāma nāgarājā ahosi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo.
atk-s0511a6:60_6: So “loke buddho uppanno”ti sutvā ñātigaṇaparivuto sakabhavanā nikkhamitvā koṭisatasahassabhikkhuparivārassa
atk-s0511a6:60_7: sumanassa bhagavato dibbehi turiyehi upahāraṁ kāretvā mahādānaṁ pavattetvā paccekadussayugāni datvā saraṇesu
atk-s0511a6:60_9: Sopi naṁ satthā “anāgate buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0511a6:75_0: Yathā koṇḍaññabuddhavaṁse, evaṁ aṭṭha gāthā vitthāretabbāti.
atk-s0511a6:79_0: Tassa pana sumanassa bhagavato mekhalaṁ nāma nagaraṁ ahosi,
atk-s0511a6:79_3: saraṇo ca bhāvitatto ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a6:79_5: soṇā ca upasoṇā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a6:85_0: Cando sucando vaṭaṁso ca, tayo pāsādamuttamā.
atk-s0511a6:88_0: Vaṭaṁsikā nāma nārī, anūpamo nāma atrajo.
atk-s0511a6:103_0: Cālā ca upacālā ca, ahesuṁ aggupaṭṭhikā.
atk-s0511a6:109_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṁ bahuṁ.
atk-s0511a6:114_0: “Te ca khīṇāsavā bhikkhū, so ca buddho asādiso;
atk-s0511a6:117_0: “Tañca ñāṇaṁ atuliyaṁ, tāni ca atulāni ratanāni;
atk-s0511a6:122_1: Dasasahassī virocatīti tassa pabhāya dasasahassīpi lokadhātu virocatīti attho.
